CONTENT.FORGET_PASSWORD_PROMPT: If forgot login password, please reset the router to restore the factory settings.
CONTENT.INVALID_PASSWORD: Password must be 6 to 15 characters long, including letters, numbers, dashes and underlines.
CONTENT.LOGIN_FAIL: Failed to login, please try again later.
CONTENT.INCORRECT_PASSWORD_WITH_REMAIN_ATTEMPTS: Incorrect password, and only {{remainAttempts}} login attempts left.
CONTENT.LOGIN_LOCKED: Unsuccessful login attempts has reached {{totalAttempts}} times, please try again {{loginDisabledRemainTime}} later.
CONTENT.SET_PASSWORD_FAIL: Fail to set password, please try again later
CONTENT.SET_PASSWORD_AT_FIRST: Please set the login password of your router before using this App.
